remixlab.bias.event

Class MotionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.bias.BogusEvent
      • remixlab.bias.event.MotionEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Copyable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DOF1Event, DOF2Event, DOF3Event, DOF6Event

    public class MotionEvent
extends BogusEvent
    Base class of all DOF_n_Events: BogusEvents defined from DOFs (degrees-of-freedom).

    A MotionEvent encapsulates a MotionShortcut. MotionEvents may be relative or absolute (see isRelative(), isAbsolute()) depending whether or not they're constructed from a previous MotionEvent. While relative motion events have distance(), speed(), and delay(), absolute motion events don't.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class remixlab.bias.BogusEvent

        ALT, ALT_GRAPH, CTRL, META, NO_ID, NO_MODIFIER_MASK, SHIFT

      Constructs an absolute MotionEvent taking the given modifiers as a MotionShortcut.

      Constructs an absolute MotionEvent taking the given modifiers and modifiers as a MotionShortcut.

      Same as return dof1Event(event, true).

      Same as return dof3Event(event, true).
      static DOF3Event dof3Event(MotionEvent event, boolean fromTranslation)
      Returns a DOF3Event from the MotionEvent translation-coordinates if fromTranslation is true and from the rotation-coordinate otherwise.
      static DOF6Event dof6Event(MotionEvent event)
      Returns a DOF6Event if the MotionEvent instanceof DOF6Event and null otherwise..
